pr_title: DB-10708 SpliceCK interactive mode and other improvements

timeline.message:
DB-10708 spliceck: more options for rget / tlist filter

-L / --limit maximum number of rows to print (default is 100)
all : print all rows
-V / --versions : versions to display. 0 = all (default is 0)
--hbase : output data like hbase

tlist <asterix filter>

e.g. tlist *SYS????S
or tlist SPLICE*
